cookie.Delete.description:
COOKIE [Shared/Menu] 

[string] name
  The name of the cookie that you want to delete.

cookie.GetNumber.description:
COOKIE [Shared/Menu] Gets the value of a cookie on the client as a number.

[string] name
  The name of the cookie that you want to get.

[any] default=nil
  Value to return if the cookie does not exist.

cookie.GetString.description:
COOKIE [Shared/Menu] Gets the value of a cookie on the client as a string.

[string] name
  The name of the cookie that you want to get.

[any] default=nil
  Value to return if the cookie does not exist.

cookie.Set.description:
COOKIE [Shared] 

[string] key
  The name of the cookie that you want to set.

[string] value
  Value to store in the cookie.
